entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
